scripts.start: ELEVENTY_ENV=development eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i styles/tailwind.css -c styles/tailwind.config.js -o _site/style/style.css --watch
scripts.start-inc: ELEVENTY_ENV=development eleventy --serve --quiet --incremental & npx tailwindcss -i styles/tailwind.css -c styles/tailwind.config.js -o _site/style/style.css --watch
scripts.build-assets: cp -r assets/display _site/assets && cp -r assets/avatars _site/assets && cp -r assets/img _site/assets && cp -r assets/video _site/assets
scripts.build-local: ELEVENTY_ENV=development eleventy && npx tailwindcss -i styles/tailwind.css -c styles/tailwind.config.js -o _site/style/style.css
scripts.build-stage: ELEVENTY_ENV=staging eleventy && npx tailwindcss -i styles/tailwind.css -c styles/tailwind.config.js -o _site/style/style.css
scripts.build-all-stage: npm run build-remove && npm run build-stage
scripts.watch: npm run build-remove && npm run build-local && npm run build-assets && npm run start
scripts.deploy: npm run build-remove-sb && npm run stage && npm run build-storybook && npm run deploy-storybook
